title: Climate and Community Investment Act
text: Creates a new authority funded by a polluter  penalty fee paid by corporate polluters to fund: 1) large scale investments like offshore  wind, electric buses, and public housing energy upgrades; 2) grants to community  organizations to create local climate, adaptation, and resiliency projects, particularly in  frontline communities; 3) support for fossil fuel dependent workers and communities;  and 4) rebates for working New Yorkers and small businesses to defray increased energy  costs.
